member.name: T:System.Json.JsonObject
member.summary: The primary type and public interface for interacting with JSON. Contains methods for reading and writing JSON along with access and manipulation of the data within.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.Json.JsonType)
member.summary: Creates a new JsonObject with the given value type.
member.param: The type of value the object will hold.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Json.JsonObject})
member.summary: Creates a new array JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Json.JsonObject}})
member.summary: Creates a new object JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new bool JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new int JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates a new long JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.summary: Creates a new double JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new string JsonObject with an initial value.
member.param: The initial value of the JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.ToJson
member.summary: Returns the JSON string representing this object.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.FromJson(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Reads a JsonObject from a TextReader.
member.param: The TextReader from which to read a JsonObject.

member.name: M:System.Json.JsonObject.FromJson(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a JsonObject from a string.
member.param: The string from which to read a JsonObject.

member.name: P:System.Json.JsonObject.JsonType
member.summary: Gets the type of value this object holds.

member.summary: Defines the type of a JsonObject.

member.summary: The object has not been initialized.

member.summary: The object is a key->value object.

member.summary: The object is an index based array.

member.summary: The object is a string.

member.summary: The object is an int.
